articles.title: Australian Open finalist Dominic Thiem fumes over plan to help out ‘unprofessional’ lower-ranked players - Fox Sports
articles.description: Australian Open runner-up Dominic Thiem has delivered a scathing attack on lower-ranked tennis players, saying he won’t donate a small amount to help them because they’re “unprofessional”.
articles.content:
A proposal by Novak Djokovic, in his role as president of the ATP player council, would see top players donate to those who dont rake in the big bucks on tour.
